item.description: Serverless Computing: One Step Forward, Two Steps Back is a remarkable assessment of the current ‚Äúserverless computing‚Äù state of affairs or the lack of it. Moreover, it has some interesting research ideas/references towards the broader vision of ‚Äútruly programmable & dynamic cloud computing‚Äù.

item.description:
Poignant perspective on the decline of Indian mainstream media in this month‚Äôs Caravan. It‚Äôs difficult to curtail Govt. coercion but easy to cut big conglomerates / advertisers by directly asking the consumer to pay for the value. It‚Äôs tough but it‚Äôs transparent, ethical, & only way for long term survival.

The Byline is Dead
